Package com.bcdipesh.model

Class BytePatternMatcher

java.lang.Object
com.bcdipesh.model.BytePatternMatcher
public class BytePatternMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
Provides byte pattern matching operations.
Version:
1.1
Author:
Dipesh B.C.

  • Constructor Details

    • BytePatternMatcher

      public BytePatternMatcher()
      Creates an object of this class. Creating object using this constructor will initialize all the class variables to their default values.

  • Method Details

    • searchPattern

      public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,​byte[]> searchPattern()
      Searches for pattern/patterns after user has selected a file or directory along with the pattern file that contains patterns to be searched.
      Returns:
      Returns a TreeMap with Integer that represents offset of the matched pattern as a key and a byte[] containing the matched pattern as the value.

    • setFile

      public void setFile​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Sets/Updates the source file. This function will set/update the currently selected file to search for pattern/patterns with the file passed to it.
      Parameters:
      file - The file selected by the user.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an IOException if the file provided is invalid.

    • setDir

      public void setDir​(java.io.File dir) throws java.io.IOException
      Sets/Updates the source directory. This function will set/update the currently selected directory to search for pattern/patterns with the file passed to it.
      Parameters:
      dir - A file representing the directory selected by the user.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an IOException if the file provided is invalid.

    • setPattern

      public void setPattern​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Sets/Updates the pattern file. This function will set/update the currently selected pattern file containing the patterns list with the file passed to it.
      Parameters:
      file - The file selected by the user.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws an IOException if the file is invalid.

    • setDirIsSelected

      public void setDirIsSelected​(boolean isSelected)
      Sets/Updates the flag. This function will set/update the flag for the application to determine if the user has selected a file or a directory.
      Parameters:
      isSelected - A boolean value that represents whether user selected a file or a directory.

    • getFoundPatterns

      public java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,​byte[]>> getFoundPatterns()
      Gets a TreeMap of patterns that are matched.
      Returns:
      Returns a TreeMap with String that represents the file name of the source as key, and a value of TreeMap of matched patterns with Integer that represents offset of the matched pattern as a key and a byte[] containing the matched pattern as the value.

    • getDirIsSelected

      public boolean getDirIsSelected()
      Gets the flag for the selected state of directory or file.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean value that represents whether the user has selected a file or a directory.
